title: Storm Surge - Book One
description: In the latest installment in the best-selling Dar & Kerry Series, it's fall, and Dar and Kerry are traveling - Dar overseas to clinch a deal with their new ship owner partners in England, and Kerry on a reluctant visit home for her high school reunion. In the midst of corporate deals and personal conflict, their world goes unexpectedly out of control when an early morning spurt of unusual alarms turns out to be the beginning of a shocking nightmare neither expected.
author: Melissa Good
